title: [jit][script] Handle torch.cat
body_html:
import torch

@torch.jit.script
def merge(x, y):
    return torch.cat([x, y])

x = torch.randn((2, 2), requires_grad=True)
y = torch.randn((2, 2), requires_grad=True)
merge(x, y)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------

      2
----> 3 @torch.jit.script
      4 def merge(x, y):
      5     return torch.cat([x, y])

    529     ast = get_jit_ast(fn)
--> 530     graph = _jit_script_compile(ast, rcb)
    531     return torch._C.GraphExecutor(graph, True)
    532

NYI: (list-literal

    (variable (ident x))
    (variable (ident y))))
:

def merge(x, y):
